title: Report a Noise Complaint
description: A citizen is calling the city's 311 line to report a loud party next door late at night.

tasks.description: Gather the location of the complaint and the nature of the noise.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately documents the address and details of the party.

tasks.description: Determine the correct department to handle the complaint (non-emergency police).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies that this type of call should be routed to the police non-emergency line.

tasks.description: Log the complaint and forward it to the police department for dispatch.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a record of the complaint and transfers it to the police queue.
